==== F-Spot ====

F-Spot has rapidly become the number 1 photo editing suite in Linux.  It has good suite of basic editing tools and great compatibility with on-line Photo services.

'''Test to perform'''

** If you have a camera plug it in.  At this point F-Spot should auto start and prepare itself for downloading the images from the camera.
** Play around with some images.
** Try export to cd or on-line photo store.
